Name: Crazy Invader ShootEm Down
About the game: The follow up to Crazy Insane Monster Invaders They're Back. Still Crazy, Still Insane. But they just got smarter and faster. Save the planet, save yourself. You are the protector so go Shoot Em Down Get ready for some fast paced retro arcade style action. Features Over 100 Crazy Levels Over 40 different Invaders Choose from Crazy or Cool Sci Fi Sound FX Fast play with no wait times Save/Load your progress Just for fun difficulty for an easy play Crazy Insane difficulty for hardcore players Change difficulty while playing Play with a Controller or keyboard
